member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.GetAllCities
member.summary: To get list of cities (Including CityID and CityName) from Cities table
member.returns: To return list of cities (Including CityID and CityName) available in Cities table

member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v2.CitiesController.GetAllCities
member.summary: To get list of cities name from Cities table
member.returns: To return list of cities name that are available in Cities table
